dcterms:description: A benchmark for multi-agent reinforcement learning that includes various micromanagement tasks in the StarCraft environment, focusing on cooperative strategies.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: A multi-agent reinforcement learning environment where multiple spiders cooperate to catch a fly in a grid-based setting, emphasizing cooperation and strategy.
